member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: F:AirportBoard.AirportBoard.CurrentLine
member.summary: Currentline *should* probably be a variable set only in Run, but it makes it harder to access it for the surrounding try-catch so that users can debug their own ABScript files. So we need to keep this here.
